General.Name: Wattana Karnpaet Public Company Limited
General.Description: Wattana Karnpaet Public Company Limited engages in hospital and medical trading businesses in Thailand. The company operates private hospital under the North Eastern Wattana Hospital name. Wattana Karnpaet Public Company Limited was incorporated in 1985 and is based in Udon Thani, Thailand.

1.Name: Dr. Sitichai  Ungklomklieow
1.Title: Medical Director, Head of Surgical Dept & Exec. Director

2.Name: Dr. Suphawan  Tangsubkul
2.Title: MD, Vice Medical Director & Exec. Director
